activities.loc: JMB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin L Skar

This covers cases 22CF68 & 22TR368.  Attorney Nero relates regarding collateral attack.  Hearing set for 12/9/2022 at 10:00 AM.  Bond continues.
Status hearing scheduled for December 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status hearing on October 21, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:07 AM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Justin L Skar appeared by video.  Attorney Adam P Nero appeared by video for Justin L Skar. 
THIS COVERS 22CF68 & 22TR368.
Formal reading of Information waived. Not guilty pleas entered to all counts and tracking citations. If is not a plea, may appear by zoom video. If a plea agreement is reached must appear in person.
Status hearing scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Ltr to Judge Bitney from Attorney Nero requesting zoom appearance.
Arraignment on July 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.

State offers exhibit 1, copy of driving record. Court receives exhibit 1.  9:38  Cross by Attorney Nero. Attorney Nero objects to bind over. Court relates and binds over.

3:00 PM  THIS COVERS 22CF68 & 22TR368.
Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Justin L Skar appeared by video.  Attorney Adam P Nero appeared by video for Justin L Skar. 
Hearing to reset the preliminary hearing and the Refusal hearing.  Attorney Nero relates to the court.  Attorney Nero thought he sent his request but it did not get to the court and he will file it ASAP. 

Time limits waived for preliminary hearing.  The Court finds waiver is knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily given.  

Parties can appear by zoom video.

10:35 AM Defendant Justin L Skar in court.  Attorney Adam P Nero appeared by video for Justin L Skar.  Attorney John A Rafa Todd in court for State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter appeared by Zoom video means. 
COVERS 22CF68 & 22TR368.
22TR368 - State relates this file is already set for a refusal hearing before Judge Babler.  Attorney Nero relates refusal is off Judge Babler's calendar now, State can call off witnesses, and all files to be handled by Judge Bitney.  
22CF68 - Formal reading of complaint waived.  Attorney Nero relates.  State relates.  Court sets refusal hearing and preliminary hearing together for 05/02/2022 at 2:30 p.m. for an hour before Judge Bitney, TR is now assigned to him, and off Branch 1 calendar. Bail continues. records.addlTxt: Dustin Rockow
Adjourned initial appearance on April 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 
Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages. 
May not go onto any premises where alcohol is sold. 
Must maintain absolute sobriety.

1:14 PM Prosecuting attorney John A Rafa Todd in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Justin L Skar appeared by video, in custody. DE to contact PD to determine eligibility.  Attorney Rockow appears on behalf of DE for today.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.
